### Contact Us

[210-658-9900](tel:210-658-9900)

Monday-Friday, 8 am to 5 pm

×

Winter Weather Update
---------------------

The City of Cibolo is closely monitoring upcoming winter weather conditions and is taking proactive steps to ensure the safety of residents, visitors, and staff. Please review the following service updates and closures.

[Read More](https://www.cibolotx.gov/alert_detail.php)
